name: Drapion LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Tri-Poison
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 3 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns. This power can’t be used if Drapion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sniping Tail
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Drapion. Drapion LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
